page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Many residents are retired.Among those still working are several men in the building trade.Two ladies are self -employed cleaners,another a home-help to the needy elderly folk, she is employed by Essex County Council. Many men are agricultural workers on local farms, another is a gardener on a large estate.3 company directors live here and travel to London and Saffron Walden.One lady owns and works in a Beauty Parlour. The milkman lives here,delivering locally and also in the surrounding villages. Other jobs include a part-time shop worker,alarm engineer,night worker, salesman and teacher also a dental technician who works in Chingford. Some home based workers are employed by firms in surrounding towns.It is pleasant to note that there is very little unemployment in the village.
